name: Liquid Bait Station
description: A parametric liquid bait station designed for pest control. Accepts a standard plastic bottle as a reservoir and features a torus-style entry point.

printSettings.Body: PLA or PETG | 4 Wall Loops | 35% Gyroid Infill

assemblyGuide: Fill a compatible small plastic bottle with liquid bait.
Insert the bottle into the reservoir cavity.
Place the station along pest pathways.
